item.title: Trump Names 'Special Ambassadors' to Hollywood
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump on Thursday named three well-known actors to be his special envoys to "very troubled" Hollywood.

item.title: DeSantis Not Interested in Federal Government Job

item.title: Outgoing FCC Chair Rejects Four Media Complaints
item.description: Jessica Rosenworcel, the outgoing Democrat chair of the Federal Communications Commission, said her agency needs to stand up for the First Amendment.
